insert into customer_inquiries_board (author, title, content, answer_status, ref, inquiry_type) values (#{author}, #{title}, #{content}, 'n', (select auto_increment from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'gott123' and table_name = 'customer_inquiries_board'), #{inquiryType})
select post_no from customer_inquiries_board where author = #{author} order by post_no desc limit 1;

INSERT INTO upload_files(thumbnail_file_name, extension, original_file_name, new_file_name, file_size) VALUES(#{thumbnailFileName}, #{extension}, #{originalFileName}, #{newFileName}, #{fileSize})
select upload_files_seq from upload_files where new_file_name = #{newFileName};
mapper.select: select *, count(u.upload_files_seq) AS uploadFilesSeq from customer_inquiries_board b inner join customer_inquiries_uf u on b.post_no = u.post_no and b.author = #{memberId} and b.post_no = #{postNo};

select * from upload_files u inner join customer_inquiries_uf c on u.upload_files_seq = c.upload_files_seq inner join customer_inquiries_board b on b.post_no = c.post_no and b.author = #{author} and b.post_no = #{postNo};
SELECT IFNULL(post_no, 0) AS post_no FROM customer_inquiries_board RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT '') AS m_dual ON post_no = #{postNo} and author = #{author};
